title: How to Live a Life of True Worship
theme: Total Consecration and Six Principles for Worship
speaker: Rev. Casimir Bilong

sermon.title: How to Live a Life of True Worship
sermon.speaker: Rev. Casimir Bilong
sermon.summary: Rev. Casimir Bilong addresses the fundamental Christian question: 'Now that I'm saved, what does the Lord expect of me?' The answer: God expects believers to live a life of true worship by offering their entire being as a living and holy sacrifice. True worship is total consecration - a lifestyle, not just Sunday services.
keyPoints: True worship is offering your whole being as a living sacrifice
Beware of the world - don't copy its behavior
Submit to spiritual transformation through meditating on God's Word
Understand your role in the body of Christ
Use your gifts faithfully - prophecy, serve, teach, encourage, give, lead
Build genuine relationships - really love others, don't pretend
Reflect Christ outside the body - be ambassadors to the world

presentation.title: How to Live a Life of True Worship - 22 Slides

prayerPoints.title: Week of November 16 Prayer Focus
actionSteps: Daily present yourself as living sacrifice
Meditate on God's Word to know His will
Identify and use your spiritual gifts
Build genuine relationships in the body

title: How to Meditate God's Way
theme: Biblical Meditation for Transformation and Success
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson

sermon.title: How to Meditate God's Way
sermon.speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
sermon.summary: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson delivers a transformative teaching on biblical meditation as God's chosen method for spiritual transformation and success. Moving beyond mere reading to deep meditation, he teaches practical frameworks like the MUSE acronym and the MEDITATE process for moving God's Word from head to heart.
keyPoints: Biblical meditation as God's chosen method for transformation
Reading gives information; meditation produces transformation
Brain rewiring through God's Word (Proverbs 23:7)
MUSE framework: Muse, Mutter, Mouth, Memorize
MEDITATE process: 8-step practical guide
Power of imagination and visualization
Tree by rivers of water: stability and fruitfulness
Meditation fuels prayer and worship
Day and night meditation as lifestyle

presentation.title: How to Meditate God's Way - 20 Slides

prayerPoints.title: Week of November 9 Prayer Focus
topics: Exchange of Thoughts for God's Thoughts
Being a Doer of the Word
actionSteps: Meditate day and night as a lifestyle

title: The Gospel of Grace
theme: Peace with God Through Jesus Christ
speaker: Bishop J. Darlingston

sermon.title: The Gospel of Grace
sermon.speaker: Bishop J. Darlingston
sermon.summary: A powerful message about Jesus as the Peace Child who legally secured our peace with God. Emphasizes that salvation is not emotional but legal - Christ satisfied every requirement of the law.
keyPoints: The Peace Child story
Legal standing before God
God is FOR us (Romans 8:31)
The Prodigal Son illustration
Access to transforming grace
Nothing can separate us from God's love

prayerPoints.title: Week of September 21 Prayer Focus
topics: Treated As Though We Never Left
actionSteps: Thank God daily that He treats you as He treats Jesus
Allow grace to teach you to say 'no' to ungodly habits

presentation.title: Have I Not Called You
presentation.description: An inspiring message about God's calling and purpose for your life
